meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one millionth of an inch.
meanings.sent1: He measured the thickness of the wire in microinches.
meanings.sent2: The machine is calibrated to measure dimensions in microinches.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant thought a microinches was a mile long!
meanings.sent4: In the world of precision engineering, a microinches can make all the difference.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler's eye for detail could detect even the smallest microinches of imperfection.
